testcase.classname: To validate login functionality of facebook
testcase.name: Validate with invalid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given The user should launch the chrome browser.............................passed When The user should type the url...........................................passed And The user should maximize the window.....................................passed And The user should type invalid username and passwords.....................passed And The user should click the login button..................................passed And The user should get the title of the incorrect page.....................passed Then The user should navigate to incorrect credential page..................passed

testcase.classname: To validate login functionality of facebook
testcase.name: Validate with invalid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given The user should launch the chrome browser.............................passed When The user should type the url...........................................passed And The user should maximize the window.....................................passed And The user should type invalid username "suresh" and valid password "7894562".passed And The user should click the login button..................................passed And The user should get the title of the incorrect page.....................passed Then The user should navigate to incorrect credential page..................passed

testcase.classname: To validate forget password feature in the facebook page
testcase.name: Verify the forget password functionality
testcase.system-out: Given The user should launch the browser....................................passed When The user should load the url...........................................passed And The user should maximize the window.....................................passed And The user should click forgot passord link...............................passed And The user should navigate to find your account page......................passed And The user should type registered mobile number or email-id...............passed And The user should click the search button.................................passed Then The user should navigate to reset your password page...................passed
